attributes.action: Close the schools to protect from Coronavirus. We need to protect everyone.
attributes.additional_details: To protect all citizens from Coronavirus. Children are vulnerable to being exposed in close proximity in classrooms hot and stuffy. A breeding zone for Coronavirus to take home and spread into a pandemic.
attributes.background: Close down the schools children are in a enclosed environment a breeding zone for Coronavirus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300403

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
